name: LinkedIn MCP Server
description: LinkedIn profile and job data extraction via authenticated browser session

LINKEDIN_COOKIE.description: Optional li_at cookie for session-based auth

PROXY_URL.description: Proxy URL for avoiding rate limits

pros: Can use cookies for persistent sessions

rationale.human: Low verification value - mostly data extraction, limited interaction visibility
rationale.agent: Moderate value - useful for professional research, recruitment tasks, and network analysis

bestPractices: Use dedicated LinkedIn account for automation
Implement rate limiting to avoid detection
Store extracted data in memory for reuse
Use proxy rotation for large-scale operations
Respect LinkedIn's rate limits and ToS
integrationSynergies: Combine with memory to cache profile data
Use with postgres to store extracted information
Pair with brave-search for additional company research
Integrate with github-official to match profiles with code contributions
Use sequentialthinking for complex recruitment workflows

toolSelectionProtocol.neverUse: For general web scraping - use firecrawl or playwright
toolSelectionProtocol.synergyWithTodoWrite: Create recruitment pipeline tasks, use LinkedIn for candidate data

warnings: Use of this server may violate LinkedIn's Terms of Service
Account suspension risk with aggressive scraping
Implement proper rate limiting and delays
Consider legal implications for data usage
